Good Comments: Best. Would be better if they didn't omit honorifics which imo really do belong in a show like this.
nice translation, but not too late on releasing please.

No honorifics. They just kept americanizing the show more and more. Translating "40ºC" into "104ºF". How the hell is anyone outside of US supposed to know how much is 104ºF? Also 20 into 8pm and such. SO STOP AMERICANIZING our anime you fags!
Bad Comments: Nice translation with using proper plural forms for Japanese words (anime instead of animes, for example) but suffers from omitting honorifics. 10bit video is a plus too.
Make a few mistakes, but the quality is good, but so damn sloowww T-T
the only one i can get from bakabt too....
Clean and simple but effective texts, with a great work of translation.
Fantastic quality, fast and easy to understand.
Americanization. Honorifics removed. Manga titles Westernized. "Name" translated as "Storyboard". Other than that, it's good.
Quality of subtitles with overlaping text and dialog doesn't correctly work on some players.
